name: Linda Loveless
text:
I ordered on line a 16 inch large pizza Halloween night 2020.
The left side was completely different than the right side , lots of yummy sounding toppings. Uber Eats delivered A COLD 72$ pizza THAT WAS  HAD INCORRECT INGREDIENTS

name: Truth Be Known
text: Absolutely loved it!!! Great pizza and great service. Our server was also very polite and on top of her game. Very pretty too...   üíØ‚ù§Ô∏èüòç

name: Tajuanya Darlington
text: It‚Äôs the best pizza we are going to get on this side of metro Atlanta. It‚Äôs not cheap pizza and it doesn‚Äôt leave a bitter after taste in your mouth. The service is good. I frequent this place and I like the pizza.

name: First Lady
text: Their salads are delicious. Service is ok as well. No complaints here yet

name: Yosselin Vasquez
text: Great pizza! We had a good experience. Our server was polite and professional and the food was delicious

name: cakemix jones
text: Popular place for deliveries which brought me there. You have to pull into a numbered spot text them your #.  They bring the food out to you. Food smells good all the way to drop offs.

name: Malika tHis DoEs nOT seeM To sUIt ouR NamE PoLiCY
text: ABSOLUTELY love it here, whether dining on or ordering from postmates, quality is consistently great every time üòç had a date one night here and honestly he loved it too, hes never been here before till then and it's definitely a favorite already!        Thanks!!

name: Kay Sanders
text: Food is always great at mellow. This photo was done by my 4 year old. I think he did great. As you can see we had the veggie pizza. We also had the Thai chili wings and a garden salad with cheese bread.

name: Ian Buford
text: Incredible service. The parking lot curbside pickup is so efficient! Always get my pizza HOT N READY!

name: #ProudMommy Selz
text: The staff is super friendly. It's a great spot for a quick bite or a hangout with friends and family. Today we stopped in for a quick salad and slice. The great white is my favorite pie and the house salad is the perfect addition. Those pretzel bites are gone pretty quickly when the kids are with us.

name: B
text: Very disappointing experience! My wife ordered from the Suwannee location thinking it was the Snellville Mellow Mushroom. Obviously, the mistake was made on our part. However, what was disappointing was the fact that I sat in the parking ‚Ä¶More

name: Steve Fitzpatrick
text: Superb pie made to order! Always great! Great people too!

name: Sophia Wonneberger
text: Great friendly service. I am very impressed with how they set up the parking lot for pickup

name: Me Yup
text: The pizza is still great, but I really miss the ambiance.....

name: Megan Pickens
text: Best pizza in town with amazing curb side service!!! Also they sell 64oz growlers of beers!!

name: Richard Sammons
text: One of my favorite pizza joints for over 30 years.  Never disappoints. Tastes the same as it did when I was a kid. The House Special pizza is my go to pie.  That coupled with a Greek salad makes for a perfect dinner.  Always friendly service, clean restaurant and fresh, hot pizza!

name: Bethany c
text: We enjoy going out. Yesterday we arrived in this superb place which we didn‚Äôt know before. We passed a beautiful time there with excellent meal and an efficient stuff and  a professional cook. We  added this venue in our phone list  and we will definitely come back very soon.  Highly recommended.

name: Kristen McClanahan
text: Amazing food, quick service, super easy curbside pickup!

name: Shane Elzer
text: A solid restaurant joint with a number of different pizza selections. I have had two different pizzas in my two visits. I've done a Mighty Meaty with all the meats and a Holy Shiitake with mushrooms and veggies. The flavors blended so well together in both cases. Fresh ingredients and a soft crust, too. Will go back.

name: Jessica Mullins
text: Just paid $20 for a one topping pizza and they didn‚Äôt even get the order right this location is terrible not the first time they‚Äôve given me the wrong order.

name: Sean Carnes
text: Nice no-contact handoff. Consistent quality.

name: TG R.
text:
Very friendly staff
Pizza was delicious and fresh

name: Spruce Wayne
text: No doubt a great pizza and the atmosphere is fun and easy going. Great for a date night or a family dinner. On Wednesday they also have trivia that starts at 7pm. Order a large pizza and enjoy. I'd give it 5 stars but man, them pizzas are pricy at around 25 bucks for a large. Still, worth it if you don't go overboard.

name: Louise Price
text: One of the best pizzas I‚Äôve ever had!  And I eat lots of pizza!

name: Davey Silvers
text: Garbage restaurant. They forgot my drinks, order was even made wrong, refused to refund me, and the manager hung up on me. Will be receiving a full refund from with worthless establishment, I will make sure of it.

name: Javon Lee
text: This was my first time at this location. I just left from curbside pick up. I guess it‚Äôs my fault for not checking my order, because the ranch and chips that I ordered were missing. I don‚Äôt even recall the girl who came to the car ever saying anything to me or giving me a chance to check. Pizza and wings are ok.

name: Norman Magers
text: Very good service and great Italian sandwich. ham, pepperoni and another meat lots of meat and great fixings. Lots of great beers 16 & 22 oz servings. Also great decor. And very clean bathroom "mens".

name: Melissa Collier
text: Delicious food and an amazingly nice staff. Will definitely be ordering from here again.

name: Ian James
text: Franchises sometimes suffer and other times they only prove how dominant they are...  You eat one and get the same Great Taste and service you are use to.  You can ask any employee for anything and they will do their best to make it happen; even if they are not your server. Just glad to be a constant pratron of Mellow. Thanks Guys!

name: libby knight
text: The chicken salad sandwich was really good! We had a party of 14 and the service was still good. The only reason I‚Äôm giving 4 stars is the lights flickered the entire time we were there! We all had a headache by time we left üò£

name: Deon Walker
text: Great food and excellent selection of local crafted beers. The service was great and fast and the beer was cold. Big shout out to the staff as they were all friendly and inviting.

name: Jessica M.
text: Extremely dissatisfied with their online ordering service. I placed my order for pickup the night before and it was nowhere near ready when I arrived. Very disappointing. Why offer the service and allow the customer to pick a specific time ‚Ä¶More

name: MARCIE MOHAMMED
text: Ordered pizza to go. This is a revised review as my initial review was not favorable. I was not pleased with my overall experience the first time I visited this restaurant. Since that time the owner cared enough to follow up with me and ‚Ä¶More

name: teraf kumardha
text: Would surely recommend trying out this place. Awesome ambience, delightful dishes, fantastic customer service. 5 stars.

name: Jared Peck
text: What can I say that would do this place justice? I have lived in every part of this country and Mellow Mushroom is my absolute favorite place to eat. Try the Maui Wowie and thank me later. Oh great mushroom wizard, tell me your secrets.

name: finefatfly
text: Awesome job with pick up orders during COVID-19!

name: Gene Ussery
text: Great food and fast service. The salads are large and good. Pizza was great and we had plenty to take home since the slices are filling.

name: latricia fountain
text: The pizza was so delicious, and had fresh ingredients!!!

name: Jill Bischoff
text: My friends & family have loved mellow mushroom for many years now. Awsome pizza great & friendly servers & recently learned they give Veterans a discount... Go! Enjoy! Cheers

name: Jack Rabbit
text: First timer. Walked in ordered Calzone. Sat at bar in next room to have a beer. No one else in room. Not even bartender. Sat by myself 20 minutes. No beer. They weren't busy. Screw them. Not returning.

name: Elizabeth Scruggs
text: The food is excellent and so was the service. I like the pretzel bites with beer cheese and the Greek salad. The pizza is very good but there are other options on the menu. I highly recommend the pizza if you haven't tried it before. Happy eats!

name: Tisha Lawson
text: Pizza taste was great & size was unexpectedly large, even after double cut ‚ò∫!! 1 Large cheese pizza fully fed family of 5 and we appreciate that greatly üòâ!!

name: Alex Whitney
text: This was my first time at this location. Service was to my standards. I love Mellow Mushroom. You'll find me 2x a month at any of the Atlanta locations. If you recognize me don't stare please. Just say hi.

name: Aretha Morgan
text: This was not my usual location, it was out of the way for me. BUT....the service, atmosphere, taste of the food was AWESOME. This kind of made up for the trip.

name: Renee Mitchell
text: My granddaughter has severe dairy allergies.  When she visits we order out AND dine in no matter how short her stay is.  Mellow Mushroom foods have taken many flights back to NYC!

name: Rick Roseberry
text: Best pizza ever. I compare it to Everybody's Pizza before they went out of business in Emory. Great service too.

name: Linda Thurmond
text: We were so tired after driving back from Tennessee and decided to eat at Mellow Mushroom. We walked in and Brett got a table cleared off, lightening fast! Ian was our waiter and he was awesome! We always have a good experience but tonight ‚Ä¶More

name: Rafae W
text: Clean place with nice staff. I ordered a Meatball hoagie with Malt Vinegar and Salt Chips. My meatball hoagie was enjoyable but was a little bit on the bland side but still tasty. Mellow Mushroom is known for their pizza though so I will reserve further judgment until I can return and try out their pizza.

name: Melissa Irving
text: My favorite crust and they have become super consistent with how good their pizza is!

name: Earl Elliot
text: Food was good. Average prices and service.  Booth space was tight we kept stepping on each other's feet.

name: Kamal Heaven
text: Always good food and good service!

name: David Milligan
text: Well it's better than any of the other chain pizza places. Decent atmosphere. Good service. Good food. I can't complain.

name: Cheri-ann Thompson
text: I ordered from here for the first time on uber eats. A part of my order was never delivered. There was some mix up between what I ordered on uber eats and what hot related to the restaurant. When the delivery driver arrived without part of ‚Ä¶More

name: Yvonne Hunt
text: More than just pizza!  While I do love Mellow Mushroom pizza you might also want to try their wings. Done just right with a variety of tasty sauces I had the Thai Chili flavor and my husband had the jerk flavored wings, just awesome. On a ‚Ä¶More

name: Kim Adams
text: The food was delicious! My first time going and definitely not my last! The waitress was awesome too. Such great suggestions on food and the atmosphere was friendly and welcoming.

name: Edward Hawthorne
text: I just ordered a Pepperoni pizza. It came to the house without pepperoni. I spoke with Brett and his solutions was to "comp" me off the pepperoni. So I guess I will pay for a cheese pizza. Customer service experience was horrible. I did not get what I asked for.

name: L Deruise
text: Always awesome. Try the jerk chicken cesar salad. Ask them to toss the chicken in the jerk sauce and have cesar dressing on the side. DEEELISH! Favorite item on the menu.

name: Jeannette Stachecki
text: Great food! Just wish kids birthday party was held outside. Too loud for rest of the other guests.

name: jahan ir
text: I love their pizza, but what I like more than pizza is their staff, cool, friendly and just perfect.

name: Leslie S.
text: Enlightened salad is excellent! Good partner to great pizza! And they use paper straws!!!

name: Alyssa Tootle
text: Great atmosphere and I love the people, especially the waitress Jennifer. She is helpful in every way and has amazing mannerism. Definitely will return and request her!

name: Tee Bee
text: Food is good. When I gave the guy that was serving us a big tip. He questioned am I sure. And was hesitant about accepting it. I guess he surprised that black people do tip well.

name: Patricia Livingston
text: Great pizza, salad, and service. A bit more noisy than I'd like.

name: Gloria Potocki
text: The food is always fresh and ohhhhh so good. All staff are very friendly and helpful. We love our Mellow Mushroom.

name: Jeff Timler
text: Service and food is ALWAYS excellent!

name: James Ollick
text: In my opinion when it comes to pizza it is all about the cheese. Mellow Mushroom hits the mark with the best cheese and just the right amount. Friendly service too.

name: Aleksander Lucy
text: Nice instance of the chain, service was friendly and prompt. Food was good.

name: Rebecca Weldon
text: Very friendly service. Same good food!

name: Lisa Scola
text: Best pizza here in the area! We are from NE Ohio and we are used to great pizza. This is the first place that we can say is awesome! I absolutely recommend it!

name: Tiffany Lynn
text: We love this place! The owner, Barbra is the sweetest and truly cares about her staff and her restaurant. Barb is really great about supporting local business in a Snellville which I LOVE. Thank you!

name: to174jay
text: Food is good but you really need to retrain your employees.  They give about as many smiles, thank you's, and youre welcome's as my local Popeyes.  Or just stop hiring emo teens.... Who would ever think that's a good idea for any business?!  Prob the same person that chose to use recycled PAPER straws.

name: Just Gregg
text: Great pizza!

name: Gail Nasr
text:
It‚Äôs ok but they try rip you off been going for years they act like they doing you a favor by serving you I spending my hard earned money millions of good restaurants in Atlanta plus charge you .75 for a smear of salad dressing
Will not be going back owner is snooty for I don‚Äôt know what reason

name: Monica Miller
text: Friendly staff. Loved the trivia night. Good food and beer.

name: peggy howard
text: Food good, but pricey.

name: Jay Juarez
text: We all were satisfied after eating here. I totally recommend this place

name: CancerSun LeoMoon
text:
This place is a very laid back atmosphere. I did not see a health score. The bathroom was decent and smelled fresh.
Our server was the same young Lady both times we've visited. She wasn't rude, ‚Ä¶More

name: Leann Bryan
text: Normally this is a great place for pizza and salad. Tonight the wait staff was not smiling and we had to ask to be served. The server we got was great, but for the second time recently, the greek salad was not very fresh. The lettuce was ‚Ä¶More

name: milton califf
text: Over rated high prices not very friendy

name: Kurt Scobie
text: Better than pizza in NYC. There, I said it.

name: Shirl See
text: I've always seen the mellow mushroom chain around the place but honestly the outside does not look appealing so I never thought of trying it.  Well on this day I took my son to gravity and he wanted pizza and his place was around the corner ‚Ä¶More

name: Heather Waringa
text: Excellent food. Ridiculously slow service. We went as a lunch break. We were there for almost an hour and a half for pizza and a sandwich. ‚Ä¶More

name: Thomas Ablan
text: The food was good and the service was great. My only complaint is that this location is right next to the highway and we sat outside. Not a problem with the establishment, more just a word of caution to others. Eat inside.

name: Brock Shelton
text: Always a pleasant place to dine and the pizza was especially good tonight :)

name: leah rainwater
text: They have delicious vegan options! The cheese is really good, as well as the tempeh and tofu. My favorite is the pacific rim, no meat, add olives and mushrooms with BBQ tempeh (no butter/parm on the crust).

name: Afrocentrk Gypsy
text: Mellow never disappoints. Food, staff, service....insert chef kiss emoji.

name: Mark Skillz
text: Food is good. I'm from New York I need to order extra cheese next time. Otherwise good.

name: Paul Allison
text: This restaurant has always been the best.

name: Rumen Nikolov
text: We went for a family dinner. It was our first time at this location. We've been before to 2 other Mellow mushroom stores - in Cary NC and Wake Forest NC. We like the franchise. I think they can use some renovation. The sealing is too much ‚Ä¶More

name: Leslie Ainsworth
text: The salads are awesome and the pizzas are so good!

name: Tori Sigety
text: We eat here whenever we want pizza. We no longer order papa John's or any fast pizza because it just not stack up. The Maui wowie is what we get every time. Service can be off sometimes, but you just have to figure out which server you like the most and then just make sure you have them every time.

name: Michelle Watkins
text: For a first visit, this location was wonderful. The food was delicious and our server was on top of her game.  Will visit again if in the area.

name: Hugo Paret
text: Good stuff, mellow mood! Pizza off the chambers

name: Jackie Cira
text: Always great pizza and even better service!

name: Marty Conner
text: Really enjoy going to Mello Mushroom. Their salads are very good and filling. The pizzas are equally good. You can also get beer and wine. I gave it 4 stars because I think the prices are a little high. But for a treat it is worth it.

name: Wardell Durrette
text: Great food and fast service. I would have given it five stars but I needed more meat on my hamburger pizza. üòú

name: Gavyn Piet
text: Very rude employees the past 3 times I have went the food was half decent but I will not give them the benefit of the doubt again horrible place overall.

name: Nancy Seaman
text: It should be at least 7 stars it so good

name: That one girl
text: Great pizza wish there was more of a mellow mushroom vibe though

name: Maggie Dog
text: Always good pizza

name: John Wilson
text: Great service good pizza

name: Brian MacLaurin
text: Laid back spot with good food...

name: Don Oltmann
text: Good pizza. Had service issue, but they corrected it and made us whole. Will go back.

name: Melissa Tyler
text: Really good food and service is good but takes quite a while for th he food to come out

name: andrea serra
text: The best build your own calzones and yummy pretzel bites ( pizza dough bites )

name: Kampol G
text: Really good vibe here. Great food. Friendly staff and owner. Every single pizza that pass around while I was waiting for the table at Wednesday Trivia night is just mouth-watering. ‚Ä¶More

name: Frank Weiss
text: Food was Fricking amazing. Had the house special really good.

name: Michel Duranleau
text: Excellent Pizza!  Very nice relaxing atmosphere!

name: noma4jon
text: Good food, attentive staff

name: Tiffany White
text: Yummy great pizza cannot go best with Mellow Mushroom

name: Thane Symons
text: Pretty good but a little bland

name: Dee Smith
text: Delicious and our waitress was EXCEPTIONAL

name: Antonia Amelio
text: Service was great.  Food was excellent!

name: Angel Castrejon
text: Good food and great service.

name: Robyn Edwards
text: It was my first time visiting this location and surprisingly they weren't busy so we decided to sit outside. Not sure if they forgot they seated us outside or what but service was non existent! There was 1 server dropping off food to the ‚Ä¶More

name: Mark Carroll
text:
I have been coming to this particular (Snellville) Mello Mushroom for over 10 years. This is by far the worst...
First, the beer tasted...  no flavor at all... like it was watered down 35%. ‚Ä¶More

name: Rick Winsatt
text: Love this place.  Great food, staff is very nice.  We will continue to come back

name: V K
text: The pizza is so good! Husband got small mighty meaty pizza and I got mushroom club sandwich. I would give 5 stars but service is a tad slow, but waiter was very friendly! Just don't go if you're in a hurry, sit and feel the chill vibe of the mushroom paintings. Wheelchair accessible on both side entrances

name: Mike Brooks
text: Really good pizza! I want to go back on trivia night, heard thats a good time.

name: Justin Archer
text: Best pizza, great atmosphere, friendly people

name: Joshua Dean
text: Great tasting pizza - one of the best in the area.

name: Becky Burgstiener
text: good pizza, horrible management. watched the owners treat the employees with disrespect the whole time I tried to order my pizza and to top it off my pizza took 5 years to make. won't be coming back.

name: Matt
text: This is an update to my previous review, which I felt the need to delete due to the owner promptly contacting me personally, she was very sincere, caring and took our concerns to heart. We have since visited again and had a great ‚Ä¶More

name: Jim Munir
text: Love that pizza and service is great.

name: Tim Nunally
text: They have great veggie calzones

name: Tom L'Heureux
text: As soon as we walked into the door, one of the employees greeted us and got us to a table. I would call it a cozy space. There is a good amount of tables/seating but you will likely have a wait for a larger group. We ordered drinks and an ‚Ä¶More

name: Deborah Cabrera-Piquant
text: Fantastic service anf good food. .

name: Maria Brown
text: New menus but prices went up a lot..I understand prices have to up.. A slice of pizzafrom  $6.00 to $9.00..that's a lot..

name: Meeka Johnson-Nelson
text: Foods great.. service is great!

name: David LaCroix
text: Can't go wrong with mellow mushroom

name: Deborah Wolfson
text: When I'm out with my family and we are trying to decide on a place to eat Mellow Mushroom always comes up as a favorite. There is always something for everyone to eat there and we have a couple of vegans in the family. Absolutely yummy, give them a try.

name: Justin Vaughn
text: Very good food..kinda pricey but still reasonable.

name: James Biggins
text: That place is kind of unique and friendly atmosphere with great tasting food

name: Emmett lol
text: Great pizza, friendly staff!

name: Joyce Jones
text: Were a little slow this visit tl take our order but once they did...it was out in a reasonable time and the beer was nice and cold!

name: Mike Stock
text: Locally  owned, well run, good food

name: Sara's Stuff
text: I have always been a fan of this place. I moved out of state years ago and there aren't any near me.  The food was great but I was disappointed to see the mega veggie and jerk chicken pizzas were no longer on the menu.

name: James O'Connell
text: As always, great food and pleasant staff.

name: Courtney C
text: An amazing restaurant. I always have a good time and the food is always great!

name: Southern Cross Church
text: The Pizza? Best in Snellville! The service? It's no Chick-fil-A, but it's not bad.

name: Usaewa
text: The food is sooooo good, I tried a calzone for the first time and it was delicious, Im hooked.üòã

name: Jason Holden
text: Best subs The crowd Is Amazing and Just A Great Vibe

name: Stephanie Wiggins
text: This is a great place to go great customer service the food is hot but it was fast and I love that it was very nice there everything was clean and I was truly happy I'm definitely going back

name: Morgan Oviatt
text: Decent  Food and a relatively enjoyable experience. There was the beginnings of what seemed like it was going to be pot related, but it turned out that my expectations are that were misconceived. What I did like was that it seemed to remind ‚Ä¶More

name: Kristine Bryant
text: Wednesday night is trivia night and we showed up for dinner with 6 people but not to play trivia. We ended up waiting 40 minutes for a table but the staff was very apologetic and kept checking in with us and giving us updates. The servers ‚Ä¶More

name: Joe Johnson
text: Have loved this place for years. The owner is always onsite and the consistency and attention to service is good, as is the food. It can get pretty noisy (especially on Wednesdays during trivia) and it certainly isn't fancy, but if you're looking for a good pizza, calzone, salad, or sub you won't be disappointed.

name: Manny Ochoa
text: Terrible service!!!! Food was good I give them that. We only got a few items of what we order after waiting for an hour. On top of that we didn't got any utensil or napkins on our table.

name: MrSpaceman1701
text:
My first time here, place has a nice 80's vibe to it. Place is spotless
The staff are warm and friendly
Decent music playing, awesome selection of beers ‚Ä¶More

name: Tim Green
text: Food is very good charge for tipping on the receipt not good business

name: Loscar Rodriguez
text: Excellent pizza!

name: DairyKills
text: Soooo good that I couldn't stop eating! Went for lunch and got 2 slices. Huge slices. Which wouldn't have been so bad except I also had parmesan pretzel as an appetizer...love the marinara dipping sauce. Oh my goodness... I'm stuffed and happy. Highly recommend the vegan cheese. Love this place.

name: Mel Irish Jr.
text: We go here almost every week for trivia (Wednesday nights 7pm) and to meet friends. We always have a good time and the food is very good.

name: Renee D
text: The food was good but the service and atmosphere was not. Tables stayed dirty with dishes for extended periods of time. Though there was a lot of people on no one seemed to be doing anything or helping each other out.

name: Joyce Schmidt
text: My favorite place for pizza - the best!  Crisp bottom crust, plenty  of fresh toppings to choose from.  Love the bruschetta and their Italian/cheese steak hoagies.   Always crowded with employees' hopping to ensure quality customer service.

name: yolanda florence
text: A great place to take the family,  Great customer service, friendly clean, a nice and wonderful place to take the family.

name: Marie F Paul
text: It's very cozy. My hoagie was fresh. Price is fair. I recommend and will be back.

name: sarah timmerman
text: Despite being ridiculously crowded the service was  very good. The foods always great. Just wish they could do something about the stupid layout of the parking... its awful

name: abby young
text: My favorite place to eat! Me and my friends go here every friday. They are quick and have great service. We love Tori! The food is always amazing. Love this place.

name: Justin M
text: Great food and service!

name: Steve Potocki
text: Great place

name: Hao Dang
text: Servers are nice. The restaurant is not always crowded however, it takes forever to bring out food. So don't visit here if you're super hungry. The waiting time for food is at least 45 mins to an hour and a half. Food is not very impressive for the price. This will be my last choice if I want to eat out.

name: Brandon Ott
text: Great food and service.  Highly recommended!

name: David Webb
text: Had the house salad and the house special Pizza. Good food and great service as always.

name: Elias Nino
text: Pizza here I would say is my top 5 favorite. Texture is similar to quick trip  but with good quality.

name: Bender Rodriguez
text: Mellow mushrooms are always a good hit when you're hungry food is always great location is clean great staff. Pizza was delicious good job guys.

name: Katrina Vital
text: Quick for lunch pickup and the pizza is good

name: Nancy Malone
text: Fresh food and good service by Megan.

name: Rick Shortt
text: Great service even on New Year's Eve with a decent crowd.  Had the mighty meaty pie and it was delicious. #pizza #mellowmushroom

name: Hendry Betts
text: Good pie needs to improve service

name: Nelson Lope
text: Great fresh local Snellville pizza. The pretzals are very good too!

name: Vic Casavant
text: Hard to walk out of here without a smile. Honestly, it's hard to walk out of here at all under these heaping portions that they serve. Customer service is always A1, would definitely recommend!

name: Roselyn Quinn
text:
Pizza great! Service great! But very crowded and karaoke was bad and loud.
I've been back you can't beat the food and service!

name: sandra irving
text: After several times at this Mellow Mushroom we are done. Love this pizza for years but this place is not consistent.  Either burnt or doughty not proofed . This time crust was raw and flat. Take out orders are often wrong. The owner should know what's going on. This is too bad for such a great pizza.

name: Janet Bowers
text: Love the mushroom soup

name: Cassandra Layne Beard
text: Food was ok...HORRIBLE service!!! I think our server must have been mellow on the 'shrooms himself....

name: Keisha Richardson
text: Great tasting pizza! They are not shy with the cheese and the crust and sauce taste great. Its everything you want in your pizza and the variations are endless. The outside does not do inside justice. I will not be eating from any other pizza spots, I've found my home.

name: Farrah Tinch
text: I always love coming here. The servers know us by face and the food is always wonderful. All of my friends love this place and we always find time to make a trip.

name: Scott Donnelly
text: Excellent service and food as always!

name: Taylor Wayman
text: I apologize for my review the other day. I should never have done that when you took time out of your day for holding an event for my coach and team. I was being selfish and rude for writing that review. I whole heartedly apologize

name: Joe Daidone
text: I only wish they gluten free pizza crust came in a larger size!

name: Jill Henson
text: Great service! Great food!

name: robert simonds
text: Went there for the first time last week. Really good pizza and sandwich.  Service is a little bit slow but not terrible and I like my pizza cut up in 8 slices not 4. If not for that I would give a 5 star rating.

name: Brandon Hollingsworth
text: This is the best pizza on the entire planet. Yes, this is a personal opinion but, I've been eating Mellow Mushroom pizza for about 20 years and haven't found a better pizza place in ATL. The "House Special" is the best. The Sneilville location is my favorite. The service is always great and the staff is always so nice.

name: Wendy A Gregerson
